programme.title: Clinton's economy
programme.short_synopsis: Does a new president mean a boost in public confidence and the economy?
programme.medium_synopsis: A month on from the presidential election, Alistair Cooke anticipates the effect that a new president, and a boost in public confidence, will have on the economy.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
